originalText.text:
I emailed Dr. Schatz asking if she were accepting new patients and if so, could she help my daughter who has a diagnosis of anxiety.

She told me (without ever meeting myself or my child) that she doesn’t see young children and “perhaps I should be the one seeing a doctor myself so I could better help my child”.

Yeah, hard pass. One star because at least I didn’t have to waste a co-pay finding out what kind of doctor Dr. Schatz is.

I emailed Dr. Schatz asking if she were accepting new patients and if so, could she help my daughter who has a diagnosis of anxiety.

She told me (without ever meeting myself or my child) that she doesn’t see young children and “perhaps I should be the one seeing a doctor myself so I could better help my child”.

Yeah, hard pass. One star because at least I didn’t have to waste a co-pay finding out what kind of doctor Dr. Schatz is.

originalText.text: Very unprofessional I met this lady once several years back because my mother and I were having issues as most teenagers do with their parents....  I remember her being very one sided, I remember thinking, as a professional in this line of work not being  bias was suppose to be  one of their strong points, fast forwarding to about 4 years ago a situation had occurred with my children and I and Dr.Schatz who was still seeing my mother was asked to comment on the situation, of course being unprofessional yet again she had nothing positive to stay about (me) a now Adult whom she only met once as a child ,she stated that something might "be biologically wrong with her" again she only met me once she clearly was unaware of the physical, and emotional abuse I sustained as a child or maybe she was and just didn't care , or the physical abuse both me and my children endured by my ex husband the man she quoted "to be a nice guy" , who later served jail time for his actions In the situation ,maybe as a African American female  she already saw me destined to fail so she predicted what most people did , but unknowing to her the same little girl who she wrote off as a adult and decided to make a statement with out actual facts on is doing  quite well , I've never been to jail, not on drugs have my own place, job, car , and kids all legally  sooooo I guess some people Do change right Dr.Schatz? So if your looking for a professional establishment where you can go and freely talk out your issue and not have to worry about being “judged” or looked down upon then this is definitely not the place for you ...

originalText.text: Very kind and accommodating doctor and doesn’t forget about you when she needs to get back in touch !

text.text: Very kind and accommodating doctor and doesn’t forget about you when she needs to get back in touch !
